0.2.name: wordpress/notifixious-plugin
0.2.description:
This plugin allows you to notify your readers on their Instant Messaging (AIM, MSN, GTalk, ICQ...), Email or SMS when you publish new posts! It also adds a widget to your blog to allow your users to choose on which channel they want to be notified!

Why do you want your user to be notified when you publish a new article?

  • Increased loyalty!
  • Faster spread for your posts: it's actually immediate!
  • RSS is somehow broken: your readers (do they all know RSS?) have to start a reader to know that you published a new article
  • They can Digg, Twit', Share on Facebook or save your post to Delicious!

Check the Notifixious for further information.
